languages.text: "Любопытно... Вот с таких, на первый взгляд, незначительных странностей обычно начинаются большие неприятности".

traits.locale_text: "Любопытно..." {n}— бормочет Хейнрикс себе под нос.{/n} "Вот с таких, на первый взгляд, незначительных странностей обычно начинаются большие неприятности".

languages.text: "Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."
languages.original_text: "Любопытно... Вот с таких, на первый взгляд, незначительных странностей обычно начинаются большие неприятности".

traits.locale_text: "Interesting..." {n}Heinrix mutters.{/n} "It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."
"Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."
"Interesting..." {n}Heinrix mutters.{/n} "It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."
"Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."

languages.text: 「興味深いな…。こうした取るに足りない例外がさらに大きなトラブルを招くというのは、よくあることだ」
languages.original_text: "Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."

traits.locale_text: 「興味深いな…。こうした取るに足りない例外がさらに大きなトラブルを招くというのは、よくあることだ」

languages.text: “很有趣……往往正是这些看似微不足道的异常现象，才带来了更大的麻烦。”
languages.original_text: "Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."

traits.locale_text: “很有趣……往往正是这些看似微不足道的异常现象，才带来了更大的麻烦。”

languages.text: «Interesante... Casi siempre son las anomalías más insignificantes las que traen mayores dolores de cabeza».
languages.original_text: "Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."

traits.locale_text: «Interesante... Casi siempre son las anomalías más insignificantes las que traen mayores dolores de cabeza».

languages.text: "Interessant ... Oft führen gerade scheinbar unbedeutende Anomalien zu größeren Schwierigkeiten."
languages.original_text: "Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."

traits.locale_text: "Interessant ... Oft führen gerade scheinbar unbedeutende Anomalien zu größeren Schwierigkeiten."

languages.text: « Intéressant... Ce sont bien souvent les anomalies insignifiantes de ce genre qui engendrent les plus gros problèmes. »
languages.original_text: "Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."

traits.locale_text: « Intéressant... Ce sont bien souvent les anomalies insignifiantes de ce genre qui engendrent les plus gros problèmes. »

languages.text: "İlginç. Bu tip önemsiz görünen anomalilerin daha büyük sıkıntılar doğurduğu çok sık oluyor."
languages.original_text: "Interesting... It is often what seem to be insignificant anomalies like these that lead to greater troubles."
